Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers free pregnancy testing, pregnancy/abortion counselling for crisis pregnancies and sensitive counselling for those suffering following an abortion. Counselling also available for partners/husbands. Resources include leaflets, booklets, videos, posters and speakers for schools and colleges. The LIFE fertility programme is now available. A LIFE education officer is based in the Sheffield centre and can offer programmes on issues such as abortion, relationships and sexually transmitted infections. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Thurs 10am-1pm (drop-in), appointments by arrangement for other times
